item.title: Hello!
item.description:
#Hi

##WELCOME to my first blog!!!##

A little bit about me- I’m currently pursuing an undergrad double degree in Computer Science and Finance, and am SUPER into both topics.

This entire website/blog has been kind of a result of COVID quarantine cabin fever and also a childhood desire to build something. This summer, I had the amazing opportunity to intern on Google Sheets, where I delved into front end
